about_the_game:
Build a way toward Victory!

Help Blocku clear levels by paving the way for him!
Blocku can already run and jump above obstacles on his own. He's a big boy!... but he's not the smartest as he'll run towards pitfalls without thinking about it twice.
... and this is when you, Player, come into the picture! You can place or remove blocks using the mouse to shape the levels' layouts! This way, you can help Blocku avoid obstacles and enemies while dashing towards the finish line!

Play around with Special Powers!

This concept sounds fun but it needs more spice don't you think? Well, all blocks are not created equal and some indeed have special powers.
How about a gravity block that pulls everything close to it when it enters its range? Or how about a speed block that accelerates time for all the things that come close to it?
We don't want to spoil too much but, we'll let your imagination handle the rest.

Make and Share Levels!

You're having fun with the game? Great!... then how about making your own levels? We might have missed some interesting block combinations so, you can let your imagination run wild and try it for yourself!
Satisfied with the result? Alright. Then how about sharing it with your friends and playing their levels? We think that this is the best part of the game and we're looking forward to playing your levels!

name: Poly-Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: None

short_description: Pave the way for Blocku-dono as you build a path toward victory! Using the mouse, you can place and remove blocks to change the level's layout and avoid obstacles/enemies! There are various blocks with different powers to spice things up, and you can create your own levels to share them!
